title: Biobank - THL
sitename: Finnish Institute for Health and Welfare
cleaned_text: - administrates versatile high-quality sample and data collections - grants access to biological samples and related data to research projects that are of high scientific quality and impact - offers comprehensive expert services providing unique research opportunities for researchers worldwide - offers extensive laboratory services - supports research projects in the areas of planning, implementation, logistics, obtaining consent, and the collection and processing of samples and data - the activities of THL Biobank are part of THL's statutory duties Contact details Tiina Wahlfors Director 7995 e-mail: [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) Postal address Finnish Institute for Health and Welfare (THL) THL Biobank Po Box 30 FI-00271 Helsinki, Finland
